Name: Meltdown Explosion
Desc: Shoots a powerful laser beam from space, scorching everything on the ground. Temporarily increases damage after use. Cannot receive a Cooldown Reduction effect.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 200. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 1500% Damage 6 times. Attacked targets have DEF -30% for 10 sec. Makes you Invincible while being cast.
Damage +10% for 25 sec. after cast.
Cooldown: 50 sec.
H.New:
MP 200. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 1500% Damage 6 times.
Attacked enemies lose 30% of MONSTER DEF for 10 sec.
Damage +10% for 25 sec. after use. Makes you Invincible while it's cast.
Cooldown: 50 sec.
